Paragraph: Both the as-cast and annealed PCDTBT thin films fail to reveal any defined scattering patterns ( Figure 3a ) , indicating the macroscopically disordered , amorphous structure.

Let's think step by step.

1. PCDTBT: This is the name of the material mentioned in the paragraph. It stands for Poly(3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene):Poly(styrenesulfonate) - Poly(3,4-ethylene dioxythiophene):Poly(thienylenevinylenedithiophene). It is a type of conducting polymer.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.
1. PCDTBT: This is the name of the material mentioned in the paragraph. It is a conducting polymer.
